pr_title: Add new functions to replace stopFilter and skipFilter

timeline.bodyText: Move lastHit.getExtent().getBlockType(lastHit.getBlockX(), lastHit.getBlockY(), lastHit.getBlockZ()) outside the loop
timeline.author: ImMorpheus

timeline.message:
Add new functions to replace stopFilter and skipFilter

These functions have been deprecated and replaced with continueWhen and selectWhen, along with clearer javadocs.

* Fix bug where a BlockRay containing a ContinueAfterFilter will give a different result upon ray reset.
Update the class JD with the new methods
Don't unnecessarily calculate the target block type in blockTypeFilter
Don't unnecessarily calculate the target block type in blockTypeFilter
